long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically searches properties on BC Assessment from:
https://www.redfin.ca
https://www.realtor.ca
https://www.zolo.ca
https://www.zealty.ca

If the address isn't found, there is a search bar to quickly search up the property of interest.

Extension based off mayview.jenny's BC Real Estate extension, but now includes Zealty.
